name: Galaxterminator
description:
Galaxterminator

Help Captain Hertz eliminate a galactic threat by exterminating all of the invaders!

WASD to move, mouse to aim, and left click to fire your bullets!

Modifications:

Added level diversity; Level 1 is a hunting level, level 2 is a chase level, and level 3 is a boss!

Added revamped Menu Screen with art by yours truly

New UI Buttons

New Backstory

Victory Theme made by yours truly
